Class Summary 
Class Description
AppMain
This is the main class
Responsibility
This class can:
- manage the application start
This class know:
- "Command" class methods
This class is " control ".
Bishop
This is the class of Bishop
Responsibility
This class can:
- define Bishop's characteristics
- define Bishop's feature
- define Bishop's movements and capture rules
This class know:
- what are the characteristics of a piece

This class is " entity ".
BishopTest  
Checks
This is the class of Checks
Responsibility
This class can:
- check the correspondence between chessboard letters and matrix indices
- translate matrix indices to chessboard numbers
- control if moves are valid
- control if moves respects italian short algebric notation
- control turn of moves
- control if a new game is requested
- control if starting position for a piece is valid
- check if King is surrounded by enemy pieces
This class know:
- "Command" class methods
- "Piece" class methods

This class is " control ".
ChecksTest  
Chessboard
This is the class of Chessboard
Responsibility
This class can:
- create the chessboard
- show the chessboard
- update the chessboard when a piece is moved
This class know:
- all pieces class methods
- "History" class methods
- "Check" class methods

This class is " control ".
CmdString
This is the class of CmdString
Responsibility
This class can:
- store information passed in algebric notation
This class know:
- nothing

This class is " noECB ".
Command
This is the class of command
Responsibility
This class can:
- show application menu
- show command list
- ask for commands
This class know:
- "Chessboard" class methods
- "History" class methods
This class is " boundary ".
CommandTest

Responsibility

- nothing
